trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 變更 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的色彩空間。

trans-unit.source: For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只有在物件初始化期間，才會發生屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始設定。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 使用建立的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>建構函式會自動初始化，並且忽略屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> is never cached.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>永遠不會快取。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> and use it to convert color.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>並用它來將色彩轉換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is converted.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the source bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 來源點陣圖的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換之點陣圖的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換之點陣圖的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class by using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何初始化的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 初始化開始。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必須之間進行屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>與一組屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 目前正在起始。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已經呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 已經完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the color profile, as defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> class, of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會識別已轉換之點陣圖的色彩設定檔 (由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 類別所定義)。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>，必須在完成變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>區塊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> of the converted bitmap.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必須之間進行屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit" /> method is called without first calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit" /> 方法在未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> 的情況下先行呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會識別已轉換的來源點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: A value that identifies the source bitmap that is converted.
trans-unit.target: 識別已轉換之來源點陣圖的值。
